name: Chocolate Chip Muffin Mug 🥗
description: Whip up a delightful Chocolate Chip Muffin Mug in just minutes! This scrumptious, single-serving treat is perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth without the hassle of baking a whole batch.
instructions: Mix together egg white, honey, and vanilla extract  in a greased coffee mug.
Add oat flour and baking powder and mix until combined.
Microwave on high for 90 seconds (times may vary).
